statements: SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency;
SELECT panel_id, location, efficiency_percentage FROM solar_panel_efficiency;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE installation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, efficiency_percentage FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE efficiency_percentage >= 20;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE efficiency_percentage > 20 ORDER BY installation_date DESC, location
SELECT location, SUM(efficiency_percentage) AS total_efficiency FROM solar_panel_efficiency GROUP BY location HAVING COUNT(panel_id) > 1

SELECT panel_id, location, installation_date, efficiency_percentage FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE location = 'New York' OR location = 'California' AND efficiency_percentage >= 15 ORDER BY installation_date ASC
SELECT AVG(efficiency_percentage) AS average_efficiency FROM solar_panel_efficiency
SELECT * FROM solar_panel_efficiency WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY efficiency_percentage DESC, location
SELECT * FROM solar_panels
SELECT panel_id, panel_type FROM solar_panels
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM solar_panels ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT panel_id, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, installation_date FROM solar_panels WHERE installation_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_id = 1;
SELECT panel_id, MAX(efficiency) as max_efficiency FROM solar_panels GROUP BY panel_type;
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, installation_date, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency_measurement, recorded_date FROM efficiency_logs WHERE panel_id = 2 AND efficiency_measurement < 0.85 ORDER BY recorded_date ASC;
SELECT panel_id, panel_type, AVG(efficiency) as avg_efficiency FROM solar_panels GROUP BY panel_type HAVING avg_efficiency > 0.75;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiency;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiency;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiency ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiency WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM SolarPanelEfficiency;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiency ORDER BY efficiency DESC, installation_date ASC;
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiency WHERE efficiency > 0.8;
SELECT AVG(efficiency) AS average_efficiency FROM SolarPanelEfficiency;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiency WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_panels, MAX(efficiency) AS max_efficiency FROM SolarPanelEfficiency;
SELECT * FROM solar_panels;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency FROM solar_panels ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM panel_readings WHERE energy_generated > 1000;
SELECT panel_id, issue_description FROM panel_issues WHERE issue_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT panel_id, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM solar_panels ORDER BY installation_date DESC, efficiency ASC
SELECT panel_id, installation_date, efficiency FROM solar_panels WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT panel_id, issue_description FROM panel_issues WHERE issue_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT pr.panel_id, pr.reading_date, pr.energy_generated, sp.efficiency FROM panel_readings pr JOIN solar_panels sp ON pr.panel_id = sp.panel_id
SELECT pl.panel_id, pl.maintenance_date, ml.maintenance_notes FROM panel_issues pl JOIN maintenance_logs ml ON pl.panel_id = ml.panel_id ORDER BY pl.maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiency;
SELECT panel_id, efficiency FROM SolarPanelEfficiency ORDER BY efficiency DESC;
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiency WHERE efficiency > 0.2;
SELECT PanelLocation.panel_id, location, latitude, longitude FROM PanelLocation LEFT JOIN SolarPanelEfficiency ON PanelLocation.panel_id = SolarPanelEfficiency.panel_id;
SELECT panel_id, maintenance_date, description FROM MaintenanceLog ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM SolarPanelEfficiency ORDER BY efficiency DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT panel_id, installation_date FROM SolarPanelEfficiency WHERE efficiency > 0.8
SELECT * FROM PanelLocation WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY longitude DESC
SELECT panel_id, maintenance_date, description FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE panel_id = 5
SELECT panel_id, rating, review FROM PanelRatings WHERE rating > 4
